channel.title: 2 simple questions about the changing adding the IP (TorvaPkz
channel.description: Well actually 2 questions. I set up my no-ip.com adress (Which is a ****no-ip.biz)Do I put that into the client files (which I did) or do I put my ip, not the Host (*****.no-ip.biz? Second of all, what do I do to fix this. I put the ****.no-ip.biz in the Client.java where it says server= . . . . But the problem is, when ever I click run server it says server started 0.0.0.0 on port 43594. I portfowarded correctly, but people can't connect. So apparently it is still on 0.0.0.0 instead of my ****.no-ip.biz. How can I fix it so that the runserver.exe uses the no-ip instead of 0.0.0.0 ----------- Sorry if it is confusing, I am VERY new to making my server, obviously lmao) ****.no-ip.biz = my no-ip. Just put **** instead of my name of no-ip

item.title: 2 simple questions about the changing adding the IP (TorvaPkz

item.description:
@Kinetic317 wrote:

What do you mean by copy and paste to the no-ip?

item.title: 2 simple questions about the changing adding the IP (TorvaPkz
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

For you to connect to it if you’re hosting, the IP must be 127.0.0.1. Make the ‘server = no-ip.biz’ and there should be another one. Search for ‘server.equals’ and make that 127.0.0.1. For anyone else to connect to it, copy and paste your client folder and change the ‘server.equals’ to the no-ip.

Read full topic
item.source: 2 simple questions about the changing adding the IP (TorvaPkz

@Kinetic317 wrote:

Well actually 2 questions. I set up my no-ip.com adress (Which is a ****no-ip.biz)Do I put that into the client files (which I did) or do I put my ip, not the Host (*****.no-ip.biz?
Second of all, what do I do to fix this. I put the ****.no-ip.biz in the Client.java where it says server= . . . . But the problem is, when ever I click run server it says server started 0.0.0.0 on port 43594. I portfowarded correctly, but people can’t connect. So apparently it is still on 0.0.0.0 instead of my ****.no-ip.biz. How can I fix it so that the runserver.exe uses the no-ip instead of 0.0.0.0

Sorry if it is confusing, I am VERY new to making my server, obviously lmao)
****.no-ip.biz = my no-ip. Just put **** instead of my name of no-ip
